Text.Page:
We've hurt the nagas, but we can't let up on the pressure.

Engage naga survivors guarding the gallery on the third floor of the temple.

Take down as many {@LinkCreature:42#210#Dagonite crusaders}, {@LinkCreature:42#310#naga tridentars} and {@LinkCreature:42#330#guardians}, and {@LinkCreature:42#900#mekonari shamans}, {@LinkCreature:42#910#witches}, and {@LinkCreature:42#1000#sentinels} as it takes.

Report to {@LinkCreature:75#1016#Glasrinne} in Frontera when you're done swimming in blood.
The nagas are weaker, thanks to you. But there's still a lot to do, and I hope you'll stick around to help out.
I never said it'd be easy, but what you're doing is helping us stay alive and do what we came here to do. Don't stop now.
